name: C. 24 Game
statement:
Little X used to play a card game called "24 Game", but recently he has
found it too easy. So he invented a new game.Initially you have a
sequence of integers: . In a single step, you can pick two of them,
let’s denote them and , erase them from the sequence, and append to the
sequence either , or , or .After steps there is only one number left.
Can you make this number equal to ?
